Sentencas: Gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) has been investigated as a promising material for application as an electrolyte in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: In this work, 10GDC powders (Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95) were synthesized by sol gel combustion and sol gel synthesis routes using the same complexing agents in both procedures.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: The thermal behavior of Gd-Ce-O precursor gels was investigated by TG-DSC measurements.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis was used for the characterization of phase purity and crystallinity of synthesized samples.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) was employed for the estimation of surface morphological features.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: Nitrogen-adsorption desorption (BET model) was used for evaluation of specific surface area.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: The surface composition was determined by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes

Sentencas: Electrical properties of synthesized ceramic samples were studied by means of impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes
Synthesis of nanocrystalline gadolinium doped ceria via sol-gel combustion and sol-gel synthesis routes
